product_name: Planet Bike Airship CO2 Tire Inflator with 12g Cartridge
long_description: The Planet Bike Airship CO2 Tire Inflator with 12g Cartridge features a lightweight yet tough design that stores a CO2 cartridge and keeps it at the ready for instant inflation. Fits Presta and Schrader valves without adapters. Includes a 12g non-threaded C02 cartridge. The Planet Bike Airship CO2 Tire Inflator with 12g and 16g non-threaded cartridges (cartridges sold separately).
short_description: The Planet Bike Airship CO2 Tire Inflator with 12g Cartridge features a lightweight yet tough design that stores a CO2 cartridge and keeps it at the ready for instant inflation.
